citing_paper_authors: Amit, Goyal | Hal, Daumé III | Suresh, Venkatasubramanian
raw_text: A problem mentioned in (Talbot and Brants, 2008) is that the algorithm that computes the compressed representation might need to retain the entire database in memory; in their paper, they design strategies to work around this problem. (Federico and Bertoldi, 2006) also used single ma chine and fewer bits to store the LM probability by using efficient prefix trees. (Uszkoreit and Brants, 2008) used partially class based LMs together with word-based LMs to improve SMT performance despite the large size of the word-based models used
clean_text: (Uszkoreit and Brants, 2008) used partially class based LMs together with word-based LMs to improve SMT performance despite the large size of the word-based models used.

citing_paper_authors: Karl Moritz, Hermann | Dipanjan, Das | Jason, Weston | Kuzman, Ganchev
raw_text: We use Brown clusters learned using the algorithm of Uszkoreit and Brants (2008) on a large English newswire corpus for cluster features
clean_text: We use Brown clusters learned using the algorithm of Uszkoreit and Brants (2008) on a large English newswire corpus for cluster features.

citing_paper_authors: Oscar, Täckström | Ryan, McDonald | Jakob, Uszkoreit
raw_text: However, rather than the more commonly used model of Brown et al (1992), we use the predictive class bigram model introduced by Uszkoreit and Brants (2008)
clean_text: However, rather than the more commonly used model of Brown et al (1992), we use the predictive class bigram model introduced by Uszkoreit and Brants (2008).

citing_paper_authors: Oscar, Täckström | Ryan, McDonald | Jakob, Uszkoreit
raw_text: By ignoring class to-class transitions, an approximate maximum likelihood clustering can be found efficiently with the distributed exchange algorithm (Uszkoreit and Brants, 2008)

citing_paper_authors: Jon, Orwant | Will, Brockman | Erez, Aiden Lieberman | Jean-Baptiste, Michel | Yuri, Lin | Slav, Petrov
raw_text: We use the following fairly standard features in our tagger: current word, suffixes and prefixes of length 1, 2 and 3; additionally we use word cluster features (Uszkoreit and Brants, 2008) for the current word, and transition features of the cluster of the current and previous word
clean_text: We use the following fairly standard features in our tagger: current word, suffixes and prefixes of length 1, 2 and 3; additionally we use word cluster features (Uszkoreit and Brants, 2008) for the current word, and transition features of the cluster of the current and previous word.

raw_text: Uszkoreit and Brants (2008) proposed a 1030 distributed clustering algorithm with a similar objective function as the Brown algorithm
clean_text: Uszkoreit and Brants (2008) proposed a distributed clustering algorithm with a similar objective function as the Brown algorithm.

raw_text: To our knowledge, Uszkoreit and Brants (2008) are the only recent authors to show an improvement in a state-of-the-art MT system using class-based LMs
clean_text: To our knowledge, Uszkoreit and Brants (2008) are the only recent authors to show an improvement in a state-of-the-art MT system using class-based LMs.

raw_text: However, both Och (1999) and Uszkoreit and Brants (2008) relied on automatically induced classes
